reviewText:
This review is just about the VHS format of the film, not the film itself.  "The Hellfire Club" can be found in its full color, widescreen glory on the DVD "Blood of the Vampire/The Hellfire Club":
http://www.amazon.com/dp/B000H1RFG4/ref=pe_385040_30332200_TE_item

The VHS version here is pan-and-scan and black-and-white.  If you were keen on seeing this movie, as I was, and couldn't find any other copy, than this is okay as a make-do.  However, the DVD release mentioned above is far superior.
